com.epoch.db

Class QSetRW

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.epoch.db.DBCommon
      • com.epoch.db.QSetRW
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AuthorConstants

    public final class QSetRW
extends DBCommon
implements AuthorConstants
    All the read operations for topics and question sets.

      • getNumQsInQSet

        public static int getNumQsInQSet(int qSetId,
                                 String authorId)
        Gets the number of master and local questions in a question set.
        Parameters:
        qSetId - unique ID of the question set
        authorId - instructor login ID; null for master author
        Returns:
        number of master questions in the question set plus either all locally authored questions in the set (if author is master author) or questions locally authored by authorId in the set (if author is local author)

                                  int qSetId,

                           throws DBException

        Parameters:

        qSetId - unique ID of the qSet to be modified (redundant)

      • getConvertibleHeaders

        public static Map<String,String> getConvertibleHeaders(boolean local)
                                                throws DBException
        Gets all headers where inputToCERs(header) != header.
        Parameters:
        local - whether to edit headers by local authors
        Returns:
        map of header by table:qSetId or table:qSetId:author
        Throws:
        DBException - if there's a problem reading the database

      • putHeader

        public static void putHeader(String key,
                             String header)
                      throws DBException
        Replaces an existing header with a new one. Used to convert UTF-8 text into ASCII with character entity representations.
        Parameters:
        key - the table and qSetID of the header and maybe the author, colon-separated
        header - the new header
        Throws:
        DBException - if there's a problem writing to the database

        Parameters:

        Returns:
        a list of chapter names
        Throws:
        DBException - if there's a problem reading the database
